name: --zg-icon-init-fill
description:
This color is set on the icon <svg> while the element has the
[init] attribute. This is meant to give an indication the column is sortable.
The [init] goes away when the column is sorted.

name: --zg-row-card-background
description: Styles the background of cards in 'card' layout-mode

name: --zg-row-card-background_editor_even
description:
Styles the background of 'even' card editor header in 'card' layout-mode
when `[editor-controls]` is added to `<zing-grid>`. 
Styling should account for the editor controls above the cells.
default: linear-gradient(var(--theme-color-lighter), var(--theme-color-lighter) 43px, var(--theme-border-color) 44px, var(--zg-row-card-background_even, var(--zg-row-card-background, var(--zg-row-body-background_even, var(--zg-row-body-background, #fff)))) 45px)

name: --zg-row-card-background_editor_odd
description:
Styles the background of 'odd' card editor header in 'card' layout-mode
when `[editor-controls]` is added to `<zing-grid>`. 
Styling should account for the editor controls above the cells.
default: linear-gradient(var(--theme-color-lighter), var(--theme-color-lighter) 43px var(--theme-border-color) 44px, var(--zg-row-card-background_odd, var(--zg-row-card-background, var(--zg-row-body-background_odd, var(--zg-row-body-background, #fff)))) 45px)

name: --zg-select-arrow-color

name: --zg-select-text-background
description: Styles the background of the 'text' portion of select

name: --zing-grid-background
description: Styles the background of grid
